content.thinking: The user wants me to add a shell function `ct()` to their zsh configuration. This function is for launching Claude Code in teammate mode with tmux. Let me look at their zsh configuration to find the right place to add it.

content.text: zsh の設定ファイルを確認します。
zsh は dotfiles で管理とのことなので、実際の `.zshrc` を確認します。

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env zsh

# ========================================
# Main zsh configuration
# ========================================

# home-manager session variables
HM_SESSION_VARS="$HOME/.local/state/home-manager/gcroots/current-home/home-path/etc/profile.d/hm-session-vars.sh"
if [ -f "$HM_SESSION_VARS" ]; then
  . "$HM_SESSION_VARS"
fi

# Enable completion
autoload -Uz compinit && compinit

# direnv
eval "$(direnv hook zsh)"

# zoxide
eval "$(zoxide init zsh)"

# git-wt
eval "$(git wt --init zsh)"

# ========================================
# Load config files
# ========================================

# oh-my-zsh configuration (must be loaded first)
source ~/.config/zsh/config/oh-my-zsh.zsh

# zsh plugins
source ~/.zsh/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh
source ~/.zsh/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh
source ~/.zsh/plugins/fzf-tab/fzf-tab.plugin.zsh

# aliases
source ~/.config/zsh/config/aliases.zsh

# ========================================
# Load functions
# ========================================

for func in ~/.config/zsh/functions/*.zsh; do
  source "$func"
done

content.text: functions ディレクトリの中身を確認します。

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env zsh

# ========================================
# Aliases
# ========================================

alias rebuild="nh os switch && source ~/.zshrc"
alias cc="claude"
alias yolo="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions"
alias p="pnpm"
alias ls="lsd -1A"
alias ll="lsd -l"
alias la="lsd -la"
alias lt="lsd --tree"
alias cat="bat"
alias prw="gh pr view --web"
alias gundo="git reset --soft HEAD~1"
alias cpd="pwd | wl-copy"
alias rmswap="find . -type f -name \"*.swp\" -delete && find . -type f -name \".*.swp\" -delete"

content.text: 既存の `claude-zai.zsh` も参考に確認します。

content.content:
1→#!/usr/bin/env zsh
     2→
     3→# claude-zai: Z.AI API経由でClaude Codeを実行
     4→function claude-zai() {
     5→  # Z.AI API Configuration (scoped to this command)
     6→  env \
     7→    ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="https://api.z.ai/api/anthropic" \
     8→    ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN="${ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN:-xxxx}" \
     9→    API_TIMEOUT_MS="3000000" \
    10→    ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL="GLM-5" \
    11→    ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL="GLM-5" \
    12→    ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL="GLM-4.7" \
    13→    claude -w "$@"
    14→}
    15→

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env zsh

# claude-zai: Z.AI API経由でClaude Codeを実行
function claude-zai() {
  # Z.AI API Configuration (scoped to this command)
  env \
    ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="https://api.z.ai/api/anthropic" \
    ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN="${ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN:-xxxx}" \
    API_TIMEOUT_MS="3000000" \
    ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL="GLM-5" \
    ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL="GLM-5" \
    ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL="GLM-4.7" \
    claude -w "$@"
}

content.text: 構造がわかりました。`zsh/functions/` に新しいファイルを作成すれば自動的に読み込まれます。

`/home/yuta/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix/zsh/functions/ct.zsh` に作成しました。`zshrc` の `for func in ~/.config/zsh/functions/*.zsh` で自動的に読み込まれます。

`source ~/.zshrc` するか新しいシェルを開けば使えるようになります。
